src_id

hop_cnt

add route
towards dest_id
to routing table
update timeout
for routes
towards src_id
and dest_id
update
dest_seq_num

seq_num
higher

every time a table entry is used
-> set new expiration time

every time a table entry is used
-> set new expiration time

RREQ
src_id
src_seq_num
broadcast_id
dest_id
dest_seq_num
hop_cnt = 1

SEND
RREP
to all active
neighbours

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 103px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
RREP
src_id
dest_id
dest_seq_num +1
hop_cnt = INF
lifetime
